reviews.review_msg: Greg is phenomenal, and humanities is not even my major. I took this class as an elective and I wanted to know more. he makes it so fun and easy to learn complex texts and theories. He's also the funniest guy, not just a professor. He is not just the best prof I have ever had, he is also one of the coolest people i have ever met.
Great teacher. Very approachable, eager to help his students, and easy going. Highly recommend to take him. The best professor at SFU I had so far.
